message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category as it deals with the problem of recovering motion fields from real-world footage. The use of a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) also suggests that it may belong to the machine learning (cs.MM) and deep learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. Additionally, the integration of the CNN into an iterative optical flow framework suggests that it may also belong to the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. Finally, the use of directional filtering and similarity matrices suggests that it may also belong to the graphics (cs.GR) sub-category.
